UsingUnfolding

This is a tutorial about using the Unfolding library for Processing by Till Nagel.

GeoJSONApp

These tutorials cover the use of GeoJSON files with Unfolding. We will build a map showing us the airports of any country we point with the mouse at. Therefore we are going to use two files of the type GeoJSON.

  • GeoJSONApp-basic
  • GeoJSONApp-ext01
  • GeoJSONApp-ext02
